title: Pizzo Bombögn
text: Pizzo Bombögn is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the Swiss <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, located between <a href="Bosco/Gurin">Bosco/Gurin</a> and <a href="Campo%20%28Vallemaggia%29">Campo (Vallemaggia)</a> in the canton of <a href="Ticino">Ticino</a>. It lies on the chain east of <a href="Pizzo%20Quadro">Pizzo Quadro</a>.
